name: Pandora's Lunchbox
description:
Its your first day of school and you've never been more excited! Unfortunately, it seems like you forgot your lunch, and you're sooooo hungry... That is, until you spot a lonely lunchbox, abandoned... Take it! It's FOR YOU! FOR YOU! FOR YOU!

Run around a school that's been corrupted by the evils of Pandora's Box and devour a deluge of delicious demons! But be careful... they've been rotting away in that cold creepy box for a millennia or two, and they're not gonna go down (or stay down) easy.
